parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.02

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes given weapon item, including magazine, from the [[binocular]] weapon.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''removeBinocularItem''' item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[removeBinocularItem]] "Laserbatteries";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addBinocularItem]], [[binocularItems]], [[removeAllBinocularItems]], [[removePrimaryWeaponItem]], [[removeSecondaryWeaponItem]], [[removeHandgunItem]]
</value></part></template>
